cab.content: (THIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OP HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY'S GOVERNMENT)ARRANGEMENTS FOR MINISTERIAL BROADCASTS.Memorandum by the Prime Minister.As a result of representations made by the Opposition,the allocation of time for broadcasting by Ministers wasreconsidered and arrangements have now been made on the basisof a new plan providing over a period of twelve weeks for:-h broadcasts by War Cabinet Ministers on Saturdays;6 broadcasts by other Ministers on Wednesdays;2 broadcasts by Opposition Leaders on Saturdays; and broadcasts by Opposition Leaders on Wednesdays.The following dates will be available for Ministerialbroadcasts up to the end of April:-Wednesdays - 20th March and 3rd and 17th April.Saturdays - 2nd and 30th March and 13th April.Subject to the above modifications, general arrange-ments will continue to be made as indicated in the memorandumenclosed in W.P.(G)(39) 57-SECRET.W.P.(G)(hO) MO.COPY NO.WAR CABINET.(Intd.) N.C.10, Downing Street, 8.W.1,13th February, 1940.
